output.name: DudLab

githubOrganizationMetadata.name: DudLab
githubOrganizationMetadata.description: A lab at the Janelia Research Campus of the Howard Hughes Medical Institute

output.organizationTypeJustification: DudLab is a principal investigator-led laboratory within the Janelia Research Campus of the Howard Hughes Medical Institute, conducting fundamental research in neuroscience and releasing open-source analytical tools, consistent with an academic research group.
output.description: A lab at the Janelia Research Campus of the Howard Hughes Medical Institute
disciplineJustification: Development of hardware-software interfaces and bioinstrumentation aligns with biological engineering.
Fundamental research into neural circuits and behavior places the lab in biology.
Modeling and analysis of neural systems corresponds to systems science and engineering.
Creation of complex data pipelines and analysis tools reflects information engineering.
Implementation of containerized, scalable software and integration with computing hardware is a hallmark of computer engineering.
output.relatedToEPFLJustification:
Reviewed all available data for the organization "DudLab" and found no evidence of affiliation with EPFL:
1. Organization name does not contain “EPFL” or related terms (no ORGANIZATION_NAME evidence).
2. No parent organization is specified as EPFL or a joint EPFL+ETH entity (no PARENT_ORGANIZATION evidence).
3. Description refers to Janelia Research Campus of the Howard Hughes Medical Institute, with no mention of EPFL (no DESCRIPTION_MENTION evidence).
4. Website/blog domain is “dudmanlab.org”, not an epfl.ch domain (no WEBSITE_DOMAIN evidence).
5. Location is listed as Ashburn, VA, USA, not Lausanne, Switzerland (no LOCATION evidence).
6. No ROR identifier linking to EPFL (no RELATED_ORGANIZATION or ROR evidence).
7. No Infoscience entities found linking this lab to EPFL (no INFOSCIENCE_ENTITY evidence).
8. No README content available or mentioning EPFL/SDSC (no README_MENTION evidence).
9. No GitHub organization membership indicating EPFL affiliation (no ORGANIZATION_MEMBERSHIP evidence).
Since no applicable evidence was identified, the cumulative confidence score is 0.0, which is below the 0.5 threshold. Therefore, relatedToEPFL is set to false.
